name: Keptin de core is unstable
description:
Ludum Dare 49 game - Theme Unstable

When you serve as chief kosmoengineer on a ship with a stupid captain, it can be hard and may require much vodka. But with your trusty hammer and a roll of duck tape made by genetically engineered duck, you can keep the ship flying!

Or you go boom. Also good.

Just few minutes worth of gameplay, I tuned down the difficulty a lot after testing the game on my GF, so now it's maybe too easy... but that's fort the postcompo version which might contain more of the madness thas was planned, voice recorded but not implemented.
